text: Farewell Romance is a romance novel by the British writer Gilbert Frankau which was first published in 1936. It has been described as a "tear- jerker".McLaren p.41 ==References== ==Bibliography== * Angus McLaren. Reproduction by Design: Sex, Robots, Trees, and Test-Tube Babies in Interwar Britain. University of Chicago Press, 2012. Category:1936 British novels Category:Novels set in England Category:Novels by Gilbert Frankau
title: Farewell Romance
